00044 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LLITE

00046 #include <linux/module.h>
00047 #include <linux/types.h>
00048 #include <linux/version.h>
00049 #include <linux/user_namespace.h>
00050 #ifdef HAVE_UIDGID_HEADER
00051 # include <linux/uidgid.h>
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 #include <lustre_dlm.h>
00055 #include <lustre_ha.h>
00056 #include <lustre_param.h>

00061 #include "llite_internal.h"
00062 
00063 struct kmem_cache *ll_remote_perm_cachep;
00064 struct kmem_cache *ll_rmtperm_hash_cachep;
00065 
00066 static inline struct ll_remote_perm *alloc_ll_remote_perm(void)
00067 {
00068         struct ll_remote_perm *lrp;
00069 
00070         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(lrp, ll_remote_perm_cachep, GFP_KERNEL);
00071         if (lrp)
00072                 INIT_HLIST_NODE(&lrp->lrp_list);
00073         return lrp;
00074 }
00075 
00076 static inline void free_ll_remote_perm(struct ll_remote_perm *lrp)
00077 {
00078         if (!lrp)
00079                 return;
00080 
00081         if (!hlist_unhashed(&lrp->lrp_list))
00082                 hlist_del(&lrp->lrp_list);
00083         OBD_SLAB_FREE(lrp, ll_remote_perm_cachep, sizeof(*lrp));
00084 }
00085 
00086 static struct hlist_head *alloc_rmtperm_hash(void)
00087 {
00088         struct hlist_head *hash;
00089         int i;
00090 
00091         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_GFP(hash, ll_rmtperm_hash_cachep,
00092                            REMOTE_PERM_HASHSIZE * sizeof(*hash),
00093                            GFP_NOFS);
00094         if (!hash)
00095                 return NULL;
00096 
00097         for (i = 0; i < REMOTE_PERM_HASHSIZE; i++)
00098                 INIT_HLIST_HEAD(hash + i);
00099 
00100         return hash;
00101 }
00102 
00103 void free_rmtperm_hash(struct hlist_head *hash)
00104 {
00105         int i;
00106         struct ll_remote_perm *lrp;
00107         struct hlist_node __maybe_unused *node;
00108         struct hlist_node *next;
00109 
00110         if(!hash)
00111                 return;
00112 
00113         for (i = 0; i < REMOTE_PERM_HASHSIZE; i++)
00114                 cfs_hlist_for_each_entry_safe(lrp, node, next, hash + i,
00115                                               lrp_list)
00116                         free_ll_remote_perm(lrp);
00117         OBD_SLAB_FREE(hash, ll_rmtperm_hash_cachep,
00118                       REMOTE_PERM_HASHSIZE * sizeof(*hash));
00119 }
00120 
00121 static inline int remote_perm_hashfunc(uid_t uid)
00122 {
00123         return uid & (REMOTE_PERM_HASHSIZE - 1);
00124 }
00125 
00126 /* NB: setxid permission is not checked here, instead it's done on
00127  * MDT when client get remote permission. */
00128 static int do_check_remote_perm(struct ll_inode_info *lli, int mask)
00129 {
00130         struct hlist_head *head;
00131         struct ll_remote_perm *lrp;
00132         struct hlist_node __maybe_unused *node;
00133         int found = 0, rc;
00134         ENTRY;
00135 
00136         if (!lli->lli_remote_perms)
00137                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
00138 
00139         head = lli->lli_remote_perms +
00140                 remote_perm_hashfunc(from_kuid(&init_user_ns, current_uid()));
00141 
00142         spin_lock(&lli->lli_lock);
00143         cfs_hlist_for_each_entry(lrp, node, head, lrp_list) {
00144                 if (lrp->lrp_uid != from_kuid(&init_user_ns, current_uid()))
00145                         continue;
00146                 if (lrp->lrp_gid != from_kgid(&init_user_ns, current_gid()))
00147                         continue;
00148                 if (lrp->lrp_fsuid != from_kuid(&init_user_ns, current_fsuid()))
00149                         continue;
00150                 if (lrp->lrp_fsgid != from_kgid(&init_user_ns, current_fsgid()))
00151                         continue;
00152                 found = 1;
00153                 break;
00154         }
00155 
00156         if (!found)
00157                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOENT);
00158 
00159         CDEBUG(D_SEC, "found remote perm: %u/%u/%u/%u - %#x\n",
00160                lrp->lrp_uid, lrp->lrp_gid, lrp->lrp_fsuid, lrp->lrp_fsgid,
00161                lrp->lrp_access_perm);
00162         rc = ((lrp->lrp_access_perm & mask) == mask) ? 0 : -EACCES;
00163 
00164 out:
00165         spin_unlock(&lli->lli_lock);
00166         return rc;
00167 }
00168 
00169 int ll_update_remote_perm(struct inode *inode, struct mdt_remote_perm *perm)
00170 {
00171         struct ll_inode_info *lli = ll_i2info(inode);
00172         struct ll_remote_perm *lrp = NULL, *tmp = NULL;
00173         struct hlist_head *head, *perm_hash = NULL;
00174         struct hlist_node __maybe_unused *node;
00175         ENTRY;
00176 
00177         LASSERT(ll_i2sbi(inode)->ll_flags & LL_SBI_RMT_CLIENT);
00178 
00179 #if 0
00180         if (perm->rp_uid != current->uid ||
00181             perm->rp_gid != current->gid ||
00182             perm->rp_fsuid != current->fsuid ||
00183             perm->rp_fsgid != current->fsgid) {
00184                 /* user might setxid in this small period */
00185                 CDEBUG(D_SEC,
00186                        "remote perm user %u/%u/%u/%u != current %u/%u/%u/%u\n",
00187                        perm->rp_uid, perm->rp_gid, perm->rp_fsuid,
00188                        perm->rp_fsgid, current->uid, current->gid,
00189                        current->fsuid, current->fsgid);
00190                 RETURN(-EAGAIN);
00191         }
00192 #endif
00193 
00194         if (!lli->lli_remote_perms) {
00195                 perm_hash = alloc_rmtperm_hash();
00196                 if (perm_hash == NULL) {
00197                         CERROR("alloc lli_remote_perms failed!\n");
00198                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00199                 }
00200         }
00201 
00202         spin_lock(&lli->lli_lock);
00203 
00204         if (!lli->lli_remote_perms)
00205                 lli->lli_remote_perms = perm_hash;
00206         else if (perm_hash)
00207                 free_rmtperm_hash(perm_hash);
00208 
00209         head = lli->lli_remote_perms + remote_perm_hashfunc(perm->rp_uid);
00210 
00211 again:
00212         cfs_hlist_for_each_entry(tmp, node, head, lrp_list) {
00213                 if (tmp->lrp_uid != perm->rp_uid)
00214                         continue;
00215                 if (tmp->lrp_gid != perm->rp_gid)
00216                         continue;
00217                 if (tmp->lrp_fsuid != perm->rp_fsuid)
00218                         continue;
00219                 if (tmp->lrp_fsgid != perm->rp_fsgid)
00220                         continue;
00221                 if (lrp)
00222                         free_ll_remote_perm(lrp);
00223                 lrp = tmp;
00224                 break;
00225         }
00226 
00227         if (!lrp) {
00228                 spin_unlock(&lli->lli_lock);
00229                 lrp = alloc_ll_remote_perm();
00230                 if (!lrp) {
00231                         CERROR("alloc memory for ll_remote_perm failed!\n");
00232                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00233                 }
00234                 spin_lock(&lli->lli_lock);
00235                 goto again;
00236         }
00237 
00238         lrp->lrp_access_perm = perm->rp_access_perm;
00239         if (lrp != tmp) {
00240                 lrp->lrp_uid         = perm->rp_uid;
00241                 lrp->lrp_gid         = perm->rp_gid;
00242                 lrp->lrp_fsuid       = perm->rp_fsuid;
00243                 lrp->lrp_fsgid       = perm->rp_fsgid;
00244                 hlist_add_head(&lrp->lrp_list, head);
00245         }
00246         lli->lli_rmtperm_time = cfs_time_current();
00247         spin_unlock(&lli->lli_lock);
00248 
00249         CDEBUG(D_SEC, "new remote perm@%p: %u/%u/%u/%u - %#x\n",
00250                lrp, lrp->lrp_uid, lrp->lrp_gid, lrp->lrp_fsuid, lrp->lrp_fsgid,
00251                lrp->lrp_access_perm);
00252 
00253         RETURN(0);
00254 }
00255 
00256 int lustre_check_remote_perm(struct inode *inode, int mask)
00257 {
00258         struct ll_inode_info *lli = ll_i2info(inode);
00259         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_i2sbi(inode);
00260         struct ptlrpc_request *req = NULL;
00261         struct mdt_remote_perm *perm;
00262         cfs_time_t save;
00263         int i = 0, rc;
00264         ENTRY;
00265 
00266         do {
00267                 save = lli->lli_rmtperm_time;
00268                 rc = do_check_remote_perm(lli, mask);
00269                 if (!rc || (rc != -ENOENT && i))
00270                         break;
00271 
00272                 might_sleep();
00273 
00274                 mutex_lock(&lli->lli_rmtperm_mutex);
00275                 /* check again */
00276                 if (save != lli->lli_rmtperm_time) {
00277                         rc = do_check_remote_perm(lli, mask);
00278                         if (!rc || (rc != -ENOENT && i)) {
00279                                 mutex_unlock(&lli->lli_rmtperm_mutex);
00280                                 break;
00281                         }
00282                 }
00283 
00284                 if (i++ > 5) {
00285                         CERROR("check remote perm falls in dead loop!\n");
00286                         LBUG();
00287                 }
00288 
00289                 rc = md_get_remote_perm(sbi->ll_md_exp, ll_inode2fid(inode),
00290                                         ll_i2suppgid(inode), &req);
00291                 if (rc) {
00292                         mutex_unlock(&lli->lli_rmtperm_mutex);
00293                         break;
00294                 }
00295 
00296                 perm = req_capsule_server_swab_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_ACL,
00297                                                    lustre_swab_mdt_remote_perm);
00298                 if (unlikely(perm == NULL)) {
00299                         mutex_unlock(&lli->lli_rmtperm_mutex);
00300                         rc = -EPROTO;
00301                         break;
00302                 }
00303 
00304                 rc = ll_update_remote_perm(inode, perm);
00305                 mutex_unlock(&lli->lli_rmtperm_mutex);
00306                 if (rc == -ENOMEM)
00307                         break;
00308 
00309                 ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00310                 req = NULL;
00311         } while (1);
00312         ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00313         RETURN(rc);
00314 }
